text: Renilde Silva Bulhões Barros (born 30 March 1947) is a Brazilian physician and politician who is currently a Senator for the state of Alagoas. She took office on 3 April 2019 after Fernando Collor de Mello took a 120-day leave. Before being elected, she was mayor of Santana do Ipanema from 2005 to 2012. She is married to Isnaldo Bulhões, the current mayor of Santana do Ipanema, and was his Secretary of Government before taking office as Senator. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:People from Santana do Ipanema Category:21st-century Brazilian women politicians Category:Members of the Federal Senate Category:Women mayors of places in Brazil Category:21st-century Brazilian politicians Category:Republican Party of the Social Order politicians
title: Renilde Bulhões
